text: Cashier: Welcome! Are you ready to order?
translation: 店員：歡迎光臨！準備好要點餐了嗎？

text: Billy: Yes! I want a burger with fifty layers of cheese.
translation: 比利：是的！我要一個有五十層起司的漢堡。

text: Cashier: Fifty layers? Your burger will be a skyscraper!
translation: 店員：五十層？你的漢堡會變成摩天大樓喔！

text: Billy: Good! I want to climb it to the moon.
translation: 比利：太好了！我想要爬著它去月亮。

text: Cashier: Do you want some super-size fries?
translation: 店員：那你想要加大份量的薯條嗎？

text: Cashier: Each fry is as long as a baseball bat!
translation: 店員：每一根薯條都跟棒球棒一樣長！

text: Billy: Wow! I can use them to play a game.
translation: 比利：哇！我可以用它們來打球了。

text: Cashier: And for your drink? A bucket of soda?
translation: 店員：那飲料呢？要來一桶汽水嗎？

text: Billy: No thanks. Just a tiny cup of water.
translation: 比利：不用了，謝謝。給我一小杯水就好。

text: Cashier: Okay. That will be one million dollars!
translation: 店員：好的，那總共是一百萬美金！

text: Billy: One million? Can I pay with my cat's hair?
translation: 比利：一百萬？我可以用我貓咪的毛付錢嗎？

text: Cashier: Only if the cat is orange and wearing a hat.
translation: 店員：除非那隻貓是橘色的，而且還有戴帽子。
